description: This source file provides configuration and environment variable management for a backend application, including database connection parsing, default configurations, and a dataclass for settings encapsulation.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A dataclass that holds application configuration settings, including database URL, JWT secret key, algorithm, token expiry, and CORS origins.

methods.name: Optional[str] _parse_db_connection_txt_line(line: str)
methods.description: Parses a line from 'db_connection.txt' to extract a SQLAlchemy-compatible database URL.

methods.name: str _default_database_url()
methods.description: Provides a default database URL suitable for local development if none is provided via environment variables.

methods.name: Settings get_settings()
methods.description: Loads application settings from environment variables, providing defaults and parsing where necessary.
